name: Idle Fish Empire
description:
CAN YOU CATCH FISH ON MARS?


In this addictive idle game you will travel the seas to catch fish and earn money.
Expand your Fish Empire and become fish industry tycoon by managing your crew and idle profits!

FEATURES

● Build and upgrade your Fishing Empire.
● Recruit incredible fishermen to you Crew.
● Explore seas, oceans and even planets for fishing
● Brawl for Stars of fishing to increase your catch
● Spin Wheel and try your Fishing Luck
● Produce canned fish
● No internet connection required

Become the greatest fishing tycoon ever!
